import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import { selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import './checkout.styles.scss' const CheckoutPage = ({cartItems, total}) => { return(
Product
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => ) }
Total ${total}
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems : selectCartItems, total : selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage)
